A4.text: He disappeared in November 1909 while aboard his boat, the Spray.

A5.text: Suhaili is the name of the 32-foot (9.8 m) Bermudan ketch sailed by Sir Robin Knox-Johnston in the first nonâ€‘stop solo circumnavigation of the world in the Sunday Times Golden Globe Race.

A6.text: Knox-Johnston duly took delivery in February 2020.
